Anomalous backpack

At first glance, this backpack appears to have no outstanding properties. However, items placed located it loses their weight over time. Rumour has it that it is the result of a shipment of backpacks for the military, accidentally getting caught in an anomaly. Attempts by scientists of recreating its unique properties have failed. Batches of anomalous backpacks have been purchased by influential people in the Zone, which have continued to export them around the globe.

Green beetle

The green beetle is an inseparable companion of every stalker. Not a single person in the Zone has never met it on their way. If spotted only once or twice throughout your lifetime, it should be considered lucky. Your mood falls in direct proportion to each subsequent meeting with the green beetle...
